attributes.comment:
Adoption costs are skyrocketing which will limit the possibility of outstanding,
wonderful, and caring perspective adults from adopting children. How could our
government suggest to raise adoption costs? How could our government raise
costs that would eliminate the possiblity for people to adopt? The costs are
already to high. Now, by adding additional costs, we are creating a situation
where children will suffer because these children will not be adopted due to the
high costs.

It has been my American dream to become a parent. I am a school teacher. My
finances are adequate to raise a child. I possess the skills, love, and desire to
become an outstanding parent. When the adoption costs increase, I would not be
able to affort the adoption process. How can our government deny my dream by
raising the cost of adoption? How can our government deny qualified perspective
parents the right to adopt? The price increase will negatively impact
AMERICANS! Stop the price increase! In fact, help provide additional monetary
support so that more qualified individuals can adopt in order to provide outstanding
homes to children who would not have an opportunity to grow, love, and succeed
in the world!
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Ed M. Theroux
